# applied(to:eventHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Scales the input values so that they all lie in the closed range `[minimum, maximum]`.

## Declaration

```swift
func applied(to input: Element, eventHandler: EventHandler? = nil) -> Element
```

## Parameters

- **input**: A floating-point value.
- **eventHandler**: An event handler.

## Return Value

A scaled value.
title: applied(to:eventHandler:)
